import seachicon from "../img/seachicon.svg"; export default function Home({ searched, pageOffset, itemCount, getType, getValue, }) { return (

    {searched .filter((item) => item.name.toLowerCase().includes(useInput)) .slice(pageOffset, pageOffset + itemCount) .map((res) => { return (
